description: My wife has a bilingual weblog. She writes in Arabic and in English. One thing she noticed is that when she writes a post in Arabic, and does not specify a post slug (URL) manually, WordPress will generate a slug in Arabic based on post title (which is encoded to equivalent URL Unicode escape charac...
